name: Special Promotion and Support
author: Tawhidur Rahman Dear

sections.description:
Attract your audience instantly that you have a Special Offer for them

  • You can use it any WordPress website.
  • Displayed at the right top of website
  • looks good in Smartphone too
  • The Plugin takes very low space in hosting
  • No need to edit settings or do something else
  • Only Plugin activation is enough to bring change for whole website

Looking for advanced solution? Buy Pro with advanced features

  • Freedom to upload own image
  • Choose any location: top-right, top-left, bottom-left, bottom-right
  • You can use this eye-catching tool for New Offer, Business Promotion, Movement or Protest Symbol, Political Party Logo, Religion Symbol, Culture, Community Promotion, Community Symbol, Celebrity Fan, Sports team, Club, Attraction to Current or upcoming event, Promoting Upcoming movie, book, music etc.
  • If you want to attract your audience to something special or if you want to show your sympathy to something, it’s the best way to display a related image in your website in a very special way. This Plugin will help you to do that easily.
  • effects for image: Fade in/out, Slide up/down and Hide/Show
  • Alternative text display; (including background and font color selection)
  • Chance to edit CSS, Image position, Cursor style, Opacity

Price is Affordable, Buy from trusted marketplace CodeCanyon

sections.installation:
Download this free WordPress.org Plugin, and

Step 1. Open your WordPress Admin Dashboard, click “Add New” in Plugins section
Step 2. Click on “Upload Plugin”
Step 3. Select the downloaded package, now click on “Install Now”
Step 4. Click on “Activate Plugin” to activate the Plugin

Done! You have successfully installed the WordPress Plugin. Now see the output in website live in browser.
